message: I'm feeling generous this round, Bob.  Take this small amount and we can both get a good chunk of the money.
Alice, let's be fair. 50/50 after inflation is the most sensible option.
Bob, I understand your desire for fairness, but I think this split is more reasonable considering the shrinking value of the money. Let's work together to ensure we both get a decent amount.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise. This is slightly better for you than 50/50, acknowledging the time pressure.
